name: SHOP 'TIL YOU DROP
description: Newcastle has a wonderful array of shops and I will take you to the best of them. I am a shopaholic who loves nothing more than finding a bargain, so can lead you to the best shops in Newcastle. In the historic heart of the city, Grainger Town's classic architecture makes shopping a visual pleasure, while the newly developed Intu Eldon Square houses department stores like Fenwick and John Lewis, plus top high street shops and designer names.
